name: Grapple Jump
description:
-----------------------------Instructions------------------------------------

❖Press the w or up arrow key to jump over mobs *click the up arrow on mobile

❖Press down or s to slide (in case there is slime) *click down arrow on mobile

❖ to pause on pc, press these buttons in order

- e

- s

- c

* for mobile, click the button on the top right

collect coins

⚠️TO DEFLECT A GHAST'S FIREBALL⚠️

When the ball is close enough to you, click on the screen to deflect it back to the ghast

Goal: to defeat the ender dragon

(yes, you can technically defeat him)

swords and bows can only be used in the end fight

credits of the game are after the war but I will put the credits in the notes and credits (because it takes around 25 - 50

 minutes to beat the game)

-------------------------Level  Creator------------------------------------

keys 0-9 for a block

*mobile click on the block to get the block

To move in play mode on mobile:

touch where you want to go, and you will go there

For mobile in the editor:

press the blue button (far left) and click on mobile
